      • Core Battalion: Warlord

        Selections: Extra Enhancement: Artefacts of Power

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Magnificent, Strategist, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Warlord


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Magnificent When you pick enhancements for your army (see 27.3), you can pick 1 extra enhancement.
        Strategist Once per battle, when you receive command points at the start of your hero phase, you can receive 1 extra command point.
        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Core Battalion: Warlord 1-2 Commanders
        2-4 Sub-commanders
        1-2 Troops

      • Gardus Steel Soul [160pts]

        Selections: Sigmarite Runeblade and Warhammer, Sigmarite Warcloak, Warlord - 2-4 Sub-Commanders

        Unit: Gardus Steel Soul, Unit Abilities: Aura of Purity, Martyr's Strength, Saintly Assault, Weapon: Sigmarite Runeblade and Warhammer, Sigmarite Warcloak


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Gardus Steel Soul 6"5104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aura of Purity Friendly HALLOWED KNIGHTS units wholly within 12" of this unit have a ward of 5+.
        Martyr's Strength Roll a dice if this unit is destroyed in the combat phase. On a 2+, this unit can fight before it is removed from play.
        Saintly Assault Once per battle, at the start of your charge phase, you can declare a saintly assault. If you do so, until the end of that turn, you can re-roll charge rolls of friendly HALLOWED KNIGHTS units wholly within 12" of this unit and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly HALLOWED KNIGHTS HEROES wholly within 12" of this unit.

      • Lord-Arcanum on Tauralon [285pts]

        Selections: Aetherstave, Celestial Blades, General, Horns and Stamping Hooves, Master of Magic, Mirrorshield, Warlord - 1-2 Commanders

        Categories: ORDER, TAURALON, STORMCAST ETERNALS, SACROSANCT, HERO, MONSTER, WIZARD, Leader, LORD-ARCANUM, LORD, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Mirrorshield, Command Trait: Master of Magic, Magic: Lord-Arcanum on Tauralon, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Celestial Blades, Lightning Orb, Mystic Shield, Unit: Lord-Arcanum on Tauralon, Unit Abilities: Comet Trail, Cycle of the Storm, Fly, Mount, Weapon: Aetherstave, Horns and Stamping Hooves


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Mirrorshield The bearer cannot be picked as the target of a shooting attack unless the attacking unit is within 9" of the bearer. Battletome: Stormcast Eternals Errata, July 2021 p1
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Master of Magic Once per hero phase, you can re-roll 1 casting roll, dispelling roll, or unbinding roll for this general.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Lord-Arcanum on Tauralon 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Lightning Orb
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Celestial Blades 512" KNIGHT
        18" DRACONITH        		If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly STORMCAST ETERNAL unit wholly within range visible to the caster. Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by that until your next hero phase.
        Lightning Orb 612"If successfully cast, pick a point on the battlefield within range and visible to the caster. Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of that point. On a 4+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Lord-Arcanum on Tauralon 14"1093+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Comet Trail After this unit has made its normal move, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS and CITIES OF SIGMAR units within 3" of this unit until your next hero phase.
        Cycle of the Storm Once per turn, if a friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS model is slain within 18" of this unit, instead of removing that model from play, you can heal 1 wound allocated to that model and it does not count as having been slain. This unit cannot use this ability on itself.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Mount This model’s Tauralon attacks with its Horns and Stamping Hooves.

        Aetherstave Melee2"43+3+-12
        Horns and Stamping Hooves Melee1"43+3+-1D3

        • Arcane Tome

          Selections: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield

          Categories: Artefact

          Artefact: Arcane Tome, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Arcane Tome The bearer becomes a WIZARD that knows the Arcane Bolt and Mystic Shield spells. They can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. If the bearer is already a Wizard, they can attempt to cast 1 additional spell instead.
        Prayer Answer ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Healing Storm 412"If answered, pick 1 friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. Heal up to D3 wounds allocated to that unit.
        Lightning Storm 412"If answered, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the chanter. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase.
        Translocation 3KNIGHT: 9"; LORD: 12"If answered, pick 1 friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS unit wholly within range and visible to the chanter. You can remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" away from all enemy units.

        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.

        Celestial Blast If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Skybolt bow is 6, the target suffers 1 mortal wound and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Champion The leader of this unit is a Judicator-Prime. Add 1 the Attacks characteristic of that model's Skybolt Bow or Shockbolt Bow.

      • Liberators [115pts]

        Selections: 5 Liberators [115pts], Battle Regiment - 2-5 Troops, Grandweapon, Heavens-wrought Weapon and Sigmarite Shield

        Categories: LIBERATORS, REDEEMER, ORDER, STORMCAST ETERNALS, Battleline

        Unit: Liberator, Unit Abilities: Champion, Lay Low the Tyrants, Sigmarite Shields, Weapon: Grandweapon, Heavens-wrought Weapon


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Liberator 5"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Champion 1 model in this unit can be a Liberator-Prime. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's Heavens-wrought Weapons, Paired Heavens-wrought Weapons, or Grandweapon.
        Lay Low the Tyrants At the end of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit that is both within 1" of this unit and within 6" of an objective, and roll a dice. On a 4+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Sigmarite Shields Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit if at least half of the models in this unit (rounding down) are armed with Sigmarite Shields.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Grandweapon Melee1"23+3+-12

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Stormcast Eternals

          Selections: Hallowed Knights, Stormkeep

          Battle Trait: Blaze of Glory, Coalition Units, Mortal Auxilliaries, Only the Faithful, Shield of Civilisation, Stormhosts


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Blaze of Glory If a friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS model is slain within 1" of an enemy unit, before removing that model from play, pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of that model and roll a number of dice equal to the Wounds characteristic of that model. Add 1 to the number of dice you roll if the slain model has the THUNDERSTRIKE keyword. For each 6, the target suffers 1 mortal wound at the end of that phase.
        Coalition Units Coalition units do not count towards the number of Battleline units in your army. However, they do count towards the maximum number of Leader, Behemoth and Artillery units in your army. Coalition units cannot be generals. In addition, Coalition units are ignored when determining if the units in your army are from a single faction.
        Mortal Auxilliaries A Stormkeep army can include coalition units. 1 in every 4 units can be coalition units from the Cities of Sigmar faction. Your general cannot be a model from a coalition unit. Any CITIES OF SIGMAR unit you include in your army gain the STORMKEEP keyword. In addition, add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly STORMKEEP units wholly within 12" of any friendly STORMKEEP REDEEMER units.
        Only the Faithful If a friendly HALLOWED KNIGHTS REDEEMER model is slain within 3" of any enemy units, roll a dice. On a 4+, that model can fight before it is removed from play.
        Shield of Civilisation In the first and second battle rounds, if any friendly STORMKEEP REDEEMER unit contest an objective that is partially or wholly within your territory, each model in that unit counts as 3 models for the purposes of contesting that objective. Starting from the third battle round, if any friendly STORMKEEP REDEEMER units contest an objective that is anywhere on the battlefield, each model in that unit counts as 3 models for the purposes of contesting that objective. In addition, if an enemy unit finishes a charge move within 1" of a friendly STORMKEEP REDEEMER unit that is within 6" of an objective you control, roll a dice. On a 3+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Stormhosts If your army is a Stormcast Eternals army, you can give it a Stormhost keyword. All STORMCAST ETERNAL units in your army gain that keyword. If a model already has a Stormhost keyword, it cannot gain another one, but this does not prevent other units in your army from having a different Stormhost keyword. You can either choose one of the Stormhosts in the list, or choose another Stormhost you've read about or created yourself. If you choose from the list below, all units with that keyword benefit from the extra abilities listed for that Stormhost. If you choose a different Stormhost, simply pick the Stormhost that most closely matches the nature of your own Stormhost.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Hold the Line

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Hold the Line


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Hold the Line When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are any Battleline units from your starting army on the battlefield.

    • Malign Sorcery [60pts]

      • Endless Spell: Emerald Lifeswarm [60pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, EMERALD LIFESWORM, GHYRAN, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Emerald Lifeswarm, Unit Abilities: Bounteous Healing, Fly, Predatory


        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Summon Emerald Lifeswarm 66"If successfully cast, set up the endless spell wholly within range of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bounteous Healing After this endless spell is set up and after it has moved, the commanding player can pick 1 unit within 1" of it. They can heal up to D3 mortal wounds allocated to that unit or, if no wounds are allocated to it, they can return a number of slain models to that unit that have a combined Wounds characteristic of D3 or less.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory This endless spell is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 8" and can fly.
